example: I need to leave now.

dialogues.text: Can you help me with this now?
dialogues.translation: 你现在能帮我处理这个吗？

dialogues.text: Sure, I'm free right now.
dialogues.translation: 当然，我现在有空。

example: We went to the park, and then we had ice cream.
example_trans: 我们去了公园，然后我们吃了冰淇淋。

dialogues.text: What did you do then?
dialogues.translation: 那你当时做了什么？

dialogues.text: Then I decided to call her.
dialogues.translation: 然后我决定给她打电话。

example: What are you doing today?

dialogues.text: Is the meeting scheduled for today?
dialogues.translation: 会议是安排在今天吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, it's today at 2 PM.
dialogues.translation: 是的，今天下午两点。

example: I saw him yesterday.

dialogues.text: What did you do yesterday?
dialogues.translation: 你昨天做了什么？

dialogues.text: Yesterday, I went shopping.
dialogues.translation: 昨天我去购物了。

example: I will see you tomorrow.

dialogues.text: What are your plans for tomorrow?
dialogues.translation: 你明天有什么计划？

dialogues.text: Tomorrow I'm going to the beach.
dialogues.translation: 明天我要去海滩。

example: He will be here soon.

dialogues.text: When will the movie start?
dialogues.translation: 电影什么时候开始？

dialogues.text: It will start soon, in about 5 minutes.
dialogues.translation: 很快就开始了，大约5分钟后。

example: Don't be late for the meeting.

dialogues.text: Why are you so late?
dialogues.translation: 你为什么这么晚？

dialogues.text: Sorry, I got stuck in traffic.
dialogues.translation: 抱歉，我遇上堵车了。

example: I woke up early today.

dialogues.text: Do you usually get to work early?
dialogues.translation: 你通常很早上班吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I like to start my day early.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我喜欢早点开始我的一天。

example: She always arrives on time.

dialogues.text: Do you always eat breakfast?
dialogues.translation: 你总是吃早餐吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I always start my day with a good meal.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我总是以一顿丰盛的餐点开始我的一天。

example: I often go for a walk in the evening.

dialogues.text: How often do you visit your grandparents?
dialogues.translation: 你多久看望一次你的祖父母？

dialogues.text: I visit them quite often, usually once a month.
dialogues.translation: 我经常去看他们，通常一个月一次。

example: Sometimes I feel tired after work.
example_trans: 有时我下班后感到疲倦。

dialogues.text: Do you cook at home?
dialogues.translation: 你在家做饭吗？

dialogues.text: Sometimes, when I have time.
dialogues.translation: 有时，当我有时间的时候。

example: I have never been to Paris.

dialogues.text: Have you ever tried skydiving?
dialogues.translation: 你尝试过跳伞吗？

dialogues.text: No, I've never done that. It seems too scary.
dialogues.translation: 不，我从未做过。那看起来太吓人了。

example: I usually wake up at 7 AM.

dialogues.text: What do you usually do on weekends?
dialogues.translation: 你周末通常做什么？

dialogues.text: I usually relax at home or meet up with friends.
dialogues.translation: 我通常在家放松或者和朋友见面。

example: He seldom talks about his past.

dialogues.text: Do you see him often?
dialogues.translation: 你经常见到他吗？

dialogues.text: No, I seldom see him these days.
dialogues.translation: 不，这些天我很少见到他。

example: She rarely eats meat.

dialogues.text: Does it snow here in winter?
dialogues.translation: 这里冬天会下雪吗？

dialogues.text: Rarely. We only get snow once every few years.
dialogues.translation: 很少。我们每隔几年才会下一次雪。

example: I have already finished my homework.
example_trans: 我已经完成我的作业了。

dialogues.text: Have you eaten lunch yet?
dialogues.translation: 你吃午饭了吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I've already eaten.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我已经吃过了。

definition: adv. 还（用于否定句和疑问句）；conj. 然而
example: Haven't you finished yet?

dialogues.text: Is dinner ready yet?
dialogues.translation: 晚饭准备好了吗？

dialogues.text: Not yet, it will be ready in about 10 minutes.
dialogues.translation: 还没有，大约10分钟后就好。

example: He is still sleeping.

dialogues.text: Are you still working on that project?
dialogues.translation: 你还在做那个项目吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I still have a lot to do.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我还有很多事情要做。

example: I just arrived.

dialogues.text: Did you hear that noise?
dialogues.translation: 你听到那个噪音了吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I just heard it too.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我也刚听到。

example: I met him two years ago.

dialogues.text: When did you move here?
dialogues.translation: 你什么时候搬到这里的？

dialogues.text: I moved here about five years ago.
dialogues.translation: 我大约五年前搬到这里的。

example: Please finish your work before you leave.
example_trans: 请在离开前完成你的工作。

dialogues.text: Have we met before?
dialogues.translation: 我们以前见过面吗？

dialogues.text: I don't think so. This is my first time here.
dialogues.translation: 我想没有。这是我第一次来这里。

example: We can go for a walk after dinner.
example_trans: 我们晚饭后可以去散步。

dialogues.text: What are you doing after work?
dialogues.translation: 你下班后做什么？

dialogues.text: I'm going to the gym after work.
dialogues.translation: 我下班后要去健身房。

definition: conj. 当...的时候；n. 一会儿
example: Don't talk while you are eating.

dialogues.text: Can you wait here for a while?
dialogues.translation: 你能在这里等一会儿吗？

dialogues.text: Sure, take your time.
dialogues.translation: 当然，慢慢来。

example: He fell asleep during the movie.
example_trans: 他在看电影期间睡着了。

dialogues.text: What did you do during your vacation?
dialogues.translation: 你假期期间做了什么？

dialogues.text: I traveled to Italy during my vacation.
dialogues.translation: 我假期期间去了意大利旅行。

definition: prep. & conj. & adv. 自从...以来
example: I haven't seen him since last year.
example_trans: 我从去年以来就没见过他。

dialogues.text: How long have you lived here?
dialogues.translation: 你在这里住了多久了？

dialogues.text: I've lived here since 2010.
dialogues.translation: 我从2010年起就住在这里了。

example: Wait until I come back.

dialogues.text: Can we leave now?
dialogues.translation: 我们现在可以离开吗？

dialogues.text: Not yet, we have to wait until the rain stops.
dialogues.translation: 还没，我们必须等到雨停。

example: I have been very busy recently.

dialogues.text: Have you seen any good movies recently?
dialogues.translation: 你最近看过什么好电影吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I recently watched a fantastic sci-fi film.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我最近看了一部很棒的科幻电影。

definition: adv. 近来，最近 (与 recently 意思相近，但更常用于现在完成时)
example: Have you seen John lately?

dialogues.text: You seem tired lately.
dialogues.translation: 你最近看起来很累。

dialogues.text: Yes, I haven't been sleeping well lately.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我最近睡眠不太好。

example: This building was formerly a school.
example_trans: 这座建筑以前是一所学校。

dialogues.text: Is this your first time visiting this city?
dialogues.translation: 这是你第一次来这个城市吗？

dialogues.text: No, I lived here formerly, about ten years ago.
dialogues.translation: 不，我以前住在这里，大约十年前。

example: As I mentioned previously, the deadline is next Friday.
example_trans: 正如我之前提到的，截止日期是下周五。

dialogues.text: Have you worked on a similar project before?
dialogues.translation: 你以前做过类似的项目吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I previously managed a team for a comparable task.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我之前管理过一个团队执行类似的任务。

example: He eventually agreed to help.

dialogues.text: Did you manage to fix the car?
dialogues.translation: 你把车修好了吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, eventually, after several hours of work.
dialogues.translation: 是的，最终，在工作了几个小时之后。

example: After a long delay, the train finally arrived.
example_trans: 长时间延误后，火车终于到了。

dialogues.text: Did you finish your report?
dialogues.translation: 你完成你的报告了吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I finally submitted it this morning.
dialogues.translation: 是的，我今天早上终于提交了。

example: Call me immediately when you arrive.
example_trans: 你一到就立刻给我打电话。

dialogues.text: There's an emergency. We need your help.
dialogues.translation: 有紧急情况，我们需要你的帮助。

dialogues.text: Okay, I'll come immediately.
dialogues.translation: 好的，我马上就来。

definition: adv. 立刻，马上 (与 immediately 类似)
example: She recognized him instantly.

dialogues.text: Did you like the gift?
dialogues.translation: 你喜欢这个礼物吗？

dialogues.text: Yes, I loved it instantly!
dialogues.translation: 是的，我立刻就爱上了它！

definition: adv. 与此同时；n. 其间
example: You set the table. Meanwhile, I'll finish cooking.
example_trans: 你摆好餐具。与此同时，我把菜做完。

dialogues.text: The flight is delayed for two hours.
dialogues.translation: 航班延误了两个小时。

dialogues.text: Okay, meanwhile, let's grab some coffee.
dialogues.translation: 好吧，在此期间，我们去喝点咖啡吧。

definition: adv. 后来，之后 (美式也用 afterward)
example: We had dinner and went for a walk afterwards.
example_trans: 我们吃了晚饭，然后去散了步。

dialogues.text: The meeting was quite long.
dialogues.translation: 会议相当长。

dialogues.text: Yes, and afterwards, we had a lot of follow-up tasks.
dialogues.translation: 是的，之后我们还有很多后续任务。

example: The product is currently unavailable.

dialogues.text: What are you working on?
dialogues.translation: 你目前在做什么？

dialogues.text: I'm currently developing a new software application.
dialogues.translation: 我目前正在开发一个新的软件应用程序。

definition: adv. 不久，马上；目前 (美式英语中更倾向于“目前”)
example: He will be here presently. (不久) / She is presently working as a consultant. (目前)
example_trans: 他马上就到。/ 她目前担任顾问。

dialogues.text: When can we expect the report?
dialogues.translation: 我们什么时候能拿到报告？

dialogues.text: It will be ready presently, within the hour.
dialogues.translation: 马上就好，一小时内。

example: The train will arrive shortly.

dialogues.text: Is the manager available?
dialogues.translation: 经理现在有空吗？

dialogues.text: He will be with you shortly.
dialogues.translation: 他很快就会来见您。

example: Henceforth, all employees must wear ID badges.
example_trans: 从此以后，所有员工必须佩戴身份徽章。

dialogues.text: The new policy has been announced.
dialogues.translation: 新政策已经宣布了。

dialogues.text: Yes, and henceforth, we must adhere to it strictly.
dialogues.translation: 是的，从此以后，我们必须严格遵守。

definition: adv. 此后，将来 (较正式，有时指死后)
example: The rules stated hereafter must be followed.
example_trans: 此后阐述的规则必须遵守。

dialogues.text: What are the long-term plans for the company?
dialogues.translation: 公司未来的长期计划是什么？

dialogues.text: Hereafter, we will focus on expanding into new markets.
dialogues.translation: 此后，我们将专注于拓展新市场。

definition: phr. 在此期间，与此同时 (与 meanwhile 类似)
example: The doctor will see you soon. In the meantime, please fill out this form.
example_trans: 医生很快就会见您。在此期间，请填写这张表格。

dialogues.text: My computer is being repaired. It will take a few days.
dialogues.translation: 我的电脑正在修理，需要几天时间。

dialogues.text: Okay, in the meantime, you can use this spare laptop.
dialogues.translation: 好的，在此期间，你可以使用这台备用笔记本电脑。

example: From now on, I will exercise every day.
example_trans: 从今以后，我每天都会锻炼。

dialogues.text: I made a mistake, and I'm sorry.
dialogues.translation: 我犯了个错误，我很抱歉。

dialogues.text: It's okay. Just try to be more careful from now on.
dialogues.translation: 没关系。从今以后尽量小心一点。

definition: phr. 从前 (常用于故事开头)
example: Once upon a time, there was a beautiful princess.
example_trans: 从前，有一位美丽的公主。

dialogues.text: Grandpa, can you tell me a story?
dialogues.translation: 爷爷，你能给我讲个故事吗？

dialogues.text: Of course. Once upon a time, in a faraway land...
dialogues.translation: 当然。从前，在一个遥远的地方……

definition: phr. 在适当的时候，到时候
example: Your application will be processed in due course.
example_trans: 您的申请将在适当的时候得到处理。

dialogues.text: When will I receive the results?
dialogues.translation: 我什么时候能收到结果？

dialogues.text: You will be notified in due course.
dialogues.translation: 到时候会通知您的。

example: Sooner or later, the truth will come out.
example_trans: 真相迟早会大白于天下。

dialogues.text: I'm worried about the exam.
dialogues.translation: 我担心考试。

dialogues.text: Don't worry, if you study hard, you'll pass sooner or later.
dialogues.translation: 别担心，如果你努力学习，迟早会通过的。

example: The kids played in the park all day long.
example_trans: 孩子们在公园里玩了一整天。

dialogues.text: You look exhausted.
dialogues.translation: 你看起来筋疲力尽。

dialogues.text: I've been working all day long.
dialogues.translation: 我工作了一整天了。

example: He did the same boring job day after day.
example_trans: 他日复一日地做着同样乏味的工作。

dialogues.text: How's your new routine?
dialogues.translation: 你的新日常怎么样？

dialogues.text: It's a bit monotonous, doing the same things day after day.
dialogues.translation: 有点单调，日复一日地做同样的事情。

example: For the time being, we'll have to manage with what we have.
example_trans: 暂时，我们只能用现有的东西应付一下了。

dialogues.text: Is this the final plan?
dialogues.translation: 这是最终计划吗？

dialogues.text: No, this is just for the time being. We might make changes later.
dialogues.translation: 不，这只是暂时的。我们稍后可能会做些更改。
